select c.id, c.name, c.annotation, c.creation_time, c.modify_time, count(ac.article_id) as article_count, u.username, u.nickname from article_classify ac left join (classify c, user_classify uc, `user` u) on ac.classify_id = c.id and uc.classify_id = c.id and u.id = uc.user_id
group by c.id, c.name, c.annotation, c.creation_time, c.modify_time, u.username, u.nickname
